name: The Awesome Adventures Of Mushroom Man And Leaf Lady
name_original: The Awesome Adventures Of Mushroom Man And Leaf Lady
description:
Once  upon a time, in a world of hatred, desire and captivity, a young Woman named ´´Leaf Lady´´ decided to chase after her dreams, chase after her freedom and search her true self.
How was this young woman, captured in her oh-so called home, able to flee? 

The answer is simple. A young Man named ´´Mushroom Man´´ came along the way and helped ´´Leaf Lady´´ to flee.

Help our two loners to their ultimate freedom, help them to become stronger, together.
